alt: Two people stand in a field. There's a plot of crops growing, and some thorn-covered trees farther away. A bunny and a peacock hang out in the grass.
description: The Rose Garden is the thorny ruins of a breath-taking greenhouse.
title: Rose Garden

alt: A person stands on the beach on a rainy night. Monstera plants, palm trees, and barnacle-encrusted rocks are scattered around them.
description: The Tropical Retreat was a summery paradise.
title: Tropical Retreat

alt: A person stands in a desert oasis while an affectionate Pangaloelin reaches up towards them. Around them are cacti, brambleweeds, and sandstone outcrops.
description: The Succulent Sanctuary is an arid landscape filled with cacti.
title: Succulent Sanctuary

alt: The player and Sparrow stand in front of a cozy cottage with poppy gardens. Sparrow says: There are a lot of useful plants growing in the forest, but it's dangerous, too.
description: Sparrow, the witch's daughter, is a shy soul who could use a friend.
title: Sparrow

alt: The player and Petya stand in the street of the Town. Petya says: I've been doing a lot of research for my book today. I'd tell you all about it, but I don't want to bore you.
description: Petya, a geeky aspiring author, is eager to get to know you.
title: Petya

alt: The player and Lazarus stand in a graveyard by a cliff. Lazarus says: Are you looking for trouble?
description: Lazarus, a prickly lone wolf crashing on the edge of town, takes a while to warm up to new people.
title: Lazarus

alt: The player stands in a room with black granite flooring and dark green walls, decorated sparsely with golden furniture.
description: Your grandfather's manse is an imposing space.
title: The Manse

alt: The player stands in a cave, surrounded by dusty grey rocks. A muddy stream flows beside them.
description: Dig your way through the mines, finding ores and precious gemstones.
title: Mines

alt: The player stands in a forest, surrounded by lush bushes and flowering trees.
description: Navigate the fae forests and come home with material wood and other delights.
title: Forest

alt: The player stands in the street, between a general store with a gaudy sign and a quiet park.
description: Spend time in the Town, filled with locals and shops.
title: Town
